ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Gnomish Spirits
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s also sold at the bar on the dock, the Seafarer s Roost, along with dwarven ale, ogre swill and the various other racial brews.  I know Kelethin has a
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 18 Dec 2000, Brian Finley wrote:

> That imports place over by the dock... I think it's a light blue building, but
> not sure. I do know it's clearly labeled "Imports" on the front, and it had
> Gnomish Spirits inside.... Which was good because I needed to make some quick
> fireworks and that was the only thing I was missing. :)

It's also sold at the bar on the dock, the Seafarer's Roost, along with
dwarven ale, ogre swill and the various other racial brews. I know
Kelethin has a similar bar, probably some other cities do, too.
